quote: Good girls go to heaven, bad girls go everywhere.
author: Mae West

quote: I like persons better than principles, and I like persons with no principles better than anything else in the world.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: She was pleased to have him come and never sorry to see him go.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: Is that a gun in your pocket, or are you just happy to see me?
author: Mae West

quote: Men are my hobby, if I ever got married I'd have to give it up.
author: Mae West

quote: Of course, youâ€™d warm up faster if you took your clothes off.
author: Stephenie Meyer

quote: Wickedness is a myth invented by good people to account for the curious attractiveness of others.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I never loved another person the way I loved myself.
author: Mae West

quote: We have reason to believe that man first walked upright to free his hands for masturbation.
author: Lily Tomlin

quote: The only sea I saw Was the seesaw sea With you riding on it. Lie down, lie easy. Let me shipwreck in your thighs.
author: Dylan Thomas, Under Milk Wood

quote: Here's to our wives and girlfriends...may they never meet!
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I can remember when the air was clean and sex was dirty.
author: George Burns

quote: If all the girls attending [the Yale prom] were laid end to end, I wouldn't be at all surprised.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: A pessimist is a man who thinks all women are bad. An optimist is a man who hopes they are.
author: Chauncey Mitchell Depew

quote: Having sex is like bridge. If you don't have a good partner, you'd better have a good hand.
author: woody allen

quote: She also said the wicked people needed love as much as good people and were much better at it.
author: Alasdair Gray,

quote: Do you want me to ride you like a rented mule, or do you prefer to be Mr. Missionary Position? I'm fine with wither, so it doesn't matter to me.
author: Katie MacAlister

quote: The universe has an itch, and I have been called upon to scratch it.
author: James Halat,

quote: COVID-19, are you going to be naughty or nice to me?
author: Steven Magee

quote: I'm a naughty sweetheart.
author: Jessica Simpson
